title: New: Dominique – Love You Better
body:
Having emerged as a sparkling talent a little under two years ago, NYC’s **Dominique** has been intricately honing her craft since then.

Whilst last year found her experimenting with her own production methods, and dealing mainly in YouTube covers, she’s now gearing up to release a debut EP of original material, featuring lead single, [Good Girl](https://soundcloud.com/dominique/good-girl), and the recently released Love You Better. Showcasing arguably her slickest songwriting so far, it’s a more melancholic sound than we’re used to from her, but it works exceedingly well. Check out Love You Better below.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
